title: As a officer of a company or lender to a company, I need to update the company's record with a charge or mortgage, so that details of any loans the company has taken out or satisfied are available to the public (102086)

details.benefit: details of any loans the company has taken out or satisfied are available to the public
details.goal: update the company's record with a charge or mortgage
met_when: knows when they need to file a charge (and about time critical filing deadline)
knows why they need to file it
knows what they need to file (any legislation changes that have an impact - eg 6/4/2013)
knows how to file it correctly and avoid common mistakes
knows if they are excluded from online filing
knows what happens if they don’t file on time
knows what happens if they don’t file at all
knows how to file if deadline has passed
knows if there is a fee for the transaction (digital differential) and how it can be paid
knows that they must be registered for online filing in advance and how new/reminder authentication is delivered, and timescales
knows that there is an informal correction procedure available to presenters
can access older mortgage forms (pre-6 April 2013 legislation)
